category-def.name: ast-view-1.0.4
category-def.label: AST View for 3.1 M5
category-def.description:
View to visualize the Java compilers abstract syntax tree generated for a Java file.
Use this version Eclipse 3.1 builds M5 and higher

category-def.name: ast-view-1.0.1
category-def.label: AST View for Eclipse 3.0
category-def.description:
View to visualize the Java compilers abstract syntax tree generated for a Java file.
Use this version of the AST view for Eclipse 3.0
